channel.title: Client crashes after 2 clicks?
channel.description:
Hey, I have a problem where the client that I play on always crashes on the second step/move of my char. I can do everything else, type, change from invo to whatever else multiple times, but i just cant walk for 2 clicks. I click the map/ground once, and my guy walks to it no problem, click the map/ground again, crash. Please help i have already googled and have come up with no solution, plus it is not only with this one client. It is with every client i try. Web clients seem to work fine though.
Info: Vista home premium x64 java jdk 19 gateway laptop.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Client crashes after 2 clicks?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Actually i found out its something with the Client as well as the jdk libs.

Read full topic

item.title: Client crashes after 2 clicks?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

zyle1992:

I have 64 bit Ubuntu, running 64-bit Java, and it still does it. I’ve tried Downloading the 32-bit libs, and it still fails.

On ubuntu use jdk5. Obviously don’t use it for everyday use; just for private server clients.

Read full topic

item.title: Client crashes after 2 clicks?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:335323”]Please use the search button next time…

The problem is with the 64 bit java libraries. Download the 32 bit libs and you should be fine.[/quote]

The problem isn’t with the 64 bit version of Java. If you use the 32 bit version on a 64-bit OS, then it will crash after a few clicks.

Read full topic

item.title: Client crashes after 2 clicks?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Please use the search button next time…

The problem is with the 64 bit java libraries. Download the 32 bit libs and you should be fine.
